name: 2 ciclopes and friends: the fight game
name_original: 2 ciclopes and friends: the fight game
description:
fighting game for mega drive / sega genesis.  

8 different characters: blue cyclop, green cyclop, punk, ala ursa, capacete, tcheco, zé redondo (mangangá), homuncullus (devwill too).

tcheco by marcelo barbosa (https://store.steampowered.com/developer/MarceloBarbosa)

capacete by pedro paiva (https://pedro-paiva.itch.io)

zé redondo and homuncullus by paulo amaweks villalva (https://paulo_villalva.itch.io)
